thread.title: Anthony Anderson & Other Celebs Who Called Off Their Divorces
thread.title_full: Anthony Anderson & Other Celebs Who Called Off Their Divorces

author: Veronica Wells
title: Anthony Anderson & Other Celebs Who Called Off Their Divorces
text: Last year, we were a little bummed to hear that Alvina Stewart, Anthony Anderson’s wife, had filed for divorce from her husband after 20 years of marriage. At the time, Stewart was asking for spousal support, joint legal custody and primary physical custody of their children. And while she initially cited irreconcilable differences as the reason for their split, it looks like they’ve been able to work some things out. According to TMZ, after over two years of separation, Stewart has dismissed their divorce proceedings. We’re happy to hear it. After all, the two are high school sweethearts and have been married since 1995. It sounds like something worth fighting for. Anthony and Alvina aren’t the only ones who’ve had a change of heart when it comes to their marriages. Here are some other couples who’ve called off their divorces. (Note: This list is different than the one we published last year. Turns out, reconciliation is more common than we thought when it comes to celebrity unions.)
